nodes.text: Gheia Six was a terrestrial astronomical object. Sometime by 34 ABY, the former athlete Raidah Doon became a known criminal to the First Order after stealing First Order funds on Gheia Six and redistributing them elsewhere. While on a mission to the planet Bracca as part of the Resistance's Dross Squadron in 34 ABY, Doon's status as a criminal was picked up by a First Order stormtrooper, who confronted the Resistance team.
Gheia Six was mentioned in Resistance Reborn, a novel written by Rebecca Roanhorse and published in 2019.
